title: cooked leeks, brown shrimp and capers
description: Fillets of delicate lemon sole are pan fried and served with a beurre noisette, shrimps and baked leeks.
ingredients: 2 leeks, trimmed and white parts cut into 10cm/4in pieces
vegetable or sunflower oil, for deep frying
165g/5¾oz whole lemon sole, cleaned and filleted
small handful fresh flatleaf parsley, chopped
